ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as1:1.1_0: Venerables, these seven principles for the settling of legal issues come up for recitation.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as1:2.1_0: “For the settling and resolving of legal issues whenever they arise there is:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as2:1.1_0: Resolution through recollection to be granted;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as3:1.1_0: Resolution because of past insanity to be granted;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as4:1.1_0: Acting according to what has been admitted;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:1.1_0: Covering over as if with grass.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:2.1_0: Venerables, the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:2.2_0: In regard to this I ask you,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:2.8_0: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:3.1_0: The section on legal issues is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.2_0: the eight rules on expulsion have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.3_0: the seventeen rules on suspension have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.4_0: the thirty rules on relinquishment and confession have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.5_0: the one hundred and sixty-six rules on confession have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.6_0: the eight rules on acknowledgment have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.7_0: the rules to be trained in have been recited;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.8_0: the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.9_0: This much has come down and is included in the Monastic Code of the Buddha and comes up for recitation every half-month.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.10_0: In regard to this everyone should train in unity, in concord, without dispute.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:4.11_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-as7:5.1_0: The canonical text on offenses entailing confession is finished.
